title: Remove Buy Course button from hero section, keep only Explore Courses button and background image

requirements.text: Remove the 'Buy Course' button from the HeroSection component (frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx), keeping only the 'Explore Courses' button visible. The button removal should not affect the existing hero section background image, layout, headline, or subheadline. Maintain the current styling and positioning of the remaining 'Explore Courses' button.
